result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Amy M. Burzynski

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
8:40 AM Prosecuting attorney Drew Lehman in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Amy M. Burzynski in court. Clerk N. Nobile.
MINUTES: Defendant advises the Court that the SPD Office sent her an email stating she is not eligible for SPD appointment and shows email to the Court. Defendant sworn in. Court finds that the defendant was rejected by the SPD Office. Court orders Attorney Michael Forella appointed as advocate counsel; Deft to pay $200/month commencing 10/01/22. Court adjourns. Copy of order appointing counsel will be mailed to the Defendant.
Status conference scheduled for November 10, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Petition for Appointment of an Attorney paperwork filed 9-23-22 put in criminal clerk bin 9-26-22
and proposed Order. Sent to Br. 6 for review
records.descr: Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt: Status conference on September 29, 2022 at 08:30 am.
left for deft re: need to change court date of 9/8

Attorney Thomas Binger appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person.  Clerk. M.Burke. After the court spoke with Attorney Watson parties believe the DE is now eligible for SPD. DE is to go back to SPD with bank statements. STC set to 09/08/22 at 10:30.
and Order, sent to Br. 2 for review
records.descr: Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt: PE for APPT of ATTY placed in CRML CLRKs bin
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
Continued posted
  *Not to Possess or Consume Alcohol.  *Not To Possess or Consume Controlled Substances w/o a Prescription.  No contact including the residence, electronic or 3rd party with: Froedert South - Kenosha Hospital except for medical treatment.

01:42 PM    Attorney Jessica Krejcarek appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  The Court finds probable cause in this case today.  Not guilty plea entered by court on behalf of DE.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 24, 2022 at 01:40 pm.  Judicial Pretrial - in court scheduled for July 28, 2022 at 10:00 am.  $150  Cash bond continued w/ same conditions (see previous bond entry).  Cash bond on deposit $150.  ts
and witness list filed by the State
